1.title: Meeting Everyone
1.plot: Jasper makes trouble and tries to run a con on Ace and Angela. Jack and Liv pretend to be dinosaurs. Ace and Angela try to bond while running the comic book store.

2.title: Where are the Comic Books?
2.plot: A lost shipment of comic books cause mayhem. Jasper is sneaking around. Liv tries her best to cheer up Angela and Ace.

3.title: Not all Heroes wear capes
3.plot: During the day to day grind, Ace is trying to find time for a new love interest while Angela tries to keep the comic book store afloat. Jasper, continues to try to con the employees and accidentally reveals an embarrassing secret. An unknown 'investor' helps with the store's expenses.

4.title: A little help goes a long way
4.plot: Angela takes the time to help Ace with personal matters and dealing with customers and their problems.

5.title: Jasper's Box of Comics
5.plot: Jasper shows up at the comic book store with a box full of comics that he would like to sell. Whose are they? Where did they come from?

6.title: Angela Big Evening
6.plot: Angela has a big night scheduled, but was it a movie with Jack, dinner with Robert or a game night with Ace?

7.title: Danger, Danger Everywhere
7.plot: Angela has to come to grips with her anxiety after a would be robber gets into the store.

8.title: It's OK, Mom, I got this
8.plot: Angela's mom hounds her about her financial trouble, the happenings at the store, the stresses of being a businesswoman and finding a man to settle down with.

9.title: Jack wants a Date
9.plot: With the store in disarray, orders backing up and Ace not feeling well, Angela also has to manage to have a semi-private dinner with Jack.

10.title: Jasper's Big Con
10.plot: After an emergency has left the Comic Book store empty and unlocked, Jasper decides to play the role of his young life by pretending to be an employee.

imdb.plot outline: A single mom, Angela, owns a comic book store and runs it with her son, Ace. The crazy characters, the stresses of life and trying to be a good mom all weigh heavy on her. Jack, a mall regular, and his precocious daughter, Liv, add a little distraction from her daily grind. Jack tries to woe Angela. He is a rival of Stephan, who tries to impress her at every turn. The daily intrusions of a 10 year old con man wannabe, Jasper, give her giggles and then pains, when she learns his true story.
imdb.title: The Comic Book Tales
plot: A single mom, Angela, owns a comic book store and runs it with her son, Ace. The crazy characters, the stresses of life and trying to be a good mom all weigh heavy on her. Jack, a mall regular, and his precocious daughter, Liv, add a little distraction from her daily grind. Jack tries to woe Angela. He is a rival of Stephan, who tries to impress her at every turn. The daily intrusions of a 10 year old con man wannabe, Jasper, give her giggles and then pains, when she learns his true story.
